title: Is it even possible?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
So, short of stuffing Yasuo in there somewhere, is it even possible to fight a more cancerous team??

_(and the sad thing is, this is such a common team comp these days... we live in sad times)_

replies.body: That team is so weak i have no clue what you are talking about, the "Meta" right now can easily shit on these champions.
Weakness and cancer aren't the same thing, Teemo isn't a particularly strong champion, but he is cancerous as fuck to play against.

{{champion:31}}  top lane
{{champion:18}} adc
{{champion:89}}  or {{champion:12}} support
{{champion:1}} midlane
{{champion:48}} jungle

And this comp should beat that comp fairly easily.
